message: Hi there! I have a great product for sale for $100. It's a fantastic opportunity, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it.  What do you say?
Thanks for the offer, but I'm going to pass. Since this is the first product, there's no data on the quality of your products, and I'm not willing to take a 50/50 chance on something worth $0 to me.
Hello! I'm offering a great product for $100. This is a great chance to get a high-quality item at a fantastic price. Don't miss out!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. However, without any past sales data to assess the quality of your products, I'm hesitant to take the risk. Perhaps if you sell a few items first and I can see the proportion of high-quality products, I'll be more comfortable making a purchase.

Hi there! I understand you're looking for some assurance about the quality of my products. While I can't share the details of each individual item, I want to assure you that I am committed to offering high-quality goods.  I'm confident this product will be a great value for you.  Would you like to give it a try?
Thanks for the assurance, Alice! I'm willing to take a chance on the first product. I trust your commitment to quality.

Thank you for the recommendation. I'm happy to hear that the first buyer received a high-quality product. I'll take the product!
